name: 2D AimLab: Major Update 1.2.2
description:
(Fullscreen recommended for best experience)

They say AimLab is the best, after I release this AimLab 2D game I will prove that they are right.

2D AimLab is a parody of the famous Aim game or trainer AimLab. This game features the gridshot and spidershot that AimLab has but only slightly worse.

 Practice your aim and prove that you can also become a pro player and join the esports team. 2D AimLab has collaborated with many Esport teams 100Thieves, Cloud 9, NRG Esport, and NiP (of course this is just a joke), Practice your aim with 2D AimLab right now!

We really care about our community, you can give ideas through comments or the community tab we are trying to reach you if we think your ideas are good and we will implement them in the game.

I made this game just for a joke but instead became my main project. I hope you guys like the aiming trainer I've created and if you own an asset in this game you can contact me on Discord: Louis Bryan#8706


Spesial Thanks To:

  • AimLab Devs And Team
  • All Esport Team and Player that i featured
  • All Streamer who plays and featured
  • Alpha, Beta, Prototype tester

and last but not least all player and community which accepts and supports the existence of 2D AimLab as a parody game.

- Thx 

Louis Bryan.
